rules_text:
First strike
When Excavator of the Beyond enters the battlefield, rediscover an artifact card. [i](Look at the top card of your library. You may reveal it and put it into your hand if it's an artifact card. Otherwise, put it back or into your graveyard.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]As one world gave way for another, the daring found treasures of old in the void between.[/i]
